column4: can people tell me some cool stuff they are doing with Ubuntu
I want to learn more about amazing things I can do with this os
so I can convert anyone
saving the world - goodone!
writing apps, encoding video, composing music, writing documents, doing accounts, playing games. The things you would normally do with a PC :)
hah
does anyone in here use bluetooth with ubuntu?
I have ordered a usb bluetooth hub and a BT headset so I can use skype from my kitchen
does BT work pretty well in Ubuntu?
also - when ripping cd's I am experiencing extremely slow cd read speeds
you need to make sure DMA is enabled on your CD drive
like 1.1-1.2x, whereas in windows, I was getting like 8x ripping
can you help me make sure, I thought that was the default...
in a console: hdparm -d /dev/cdrom
if dma says 0 do: hdparm -d 1 /dev/cdrom
do you mind if we have private chat so you can walk me through this
yes, just do it in the chan :)
sounds good - sorry about the output
just open a console and do those commands with 'sudo' in front of them
you should see transfer rates jump to 8x
it is off, your are right
brilliant channel
however i don't know the best way to enable it by default under ubuntu
